confirmModal.body: Please confirm to update changed values
confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

payload.rawSql:
INSERT INTO
  `db-teg-test1`.alarm_sensors (
    device_location_id,
    client_id,
    type,
    severity,
    alarm_role,
    set_point,
    every,
    description,
    status
  )
VALUES
  (
    ${payload.device_location_id},
    ${getClientID},
    ${payload.type},
    ${payload.severity},
    ${payload.alarm_role},
    ${payload.set_point},
    ${payload.every},
    '',
    case when ${payload.severity} = 4 then 1 else 0 end
  )

targets.rawSql:
SELECT number, 
case
  when number = 0 then '='
  when number = 1 then '<'
  when number = 2 then '>'
  when number = 3 then '<='
  when number = 4 then '>='
  else 'Undefined'
end as name_type,
case
  when number = 4 then 'Normal'
  when number = 3 then 'Minor'
  when number = 2 then 'Major'
  when number = 1 then 'Warning'
  when number = 0 then 'Critical'
  else 'Undefined'
end as name_severity FROM `db-teg-test1`.count ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT number, 
case
  when number = 0 then 'Clear Alarm'
  when number = 1 then 'Create Alarm'
  else 'Undefined'
end as name_role FROM `db-teg-test1`.count ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 2;

SELECT dl.id, s.serial, d.mac_address, l.name location FROM `db-teg-test1`.device_locations dl 
  inner join `db-teg-test1`.clients c on c.id = dl.client_id
  inner join `db-teg-test1`.devices d on d.id = dl.device_id
  inner join `db-teg-test1`.sensors s on s.id = dl.sensor_id
  inner join `db-teg-test1`.locations l on l.id = dl.location_id
where c.name = '$getClient';

payload.rawSql:
UPDATE `db-teg-test1`.alarm_sensors
SET device_location_id = '${payload.device_location_id}',
    client_id = '${getClientID}',
    type = '${payload.name_type}',
    severity = '${payload.name_severity}',
    alarm_role = '${payload.alarm_role}',
    set_point = '${payload.set_point}',
    every = '${payload.every}',
    description = '${payload.description}',
    status = case when '${payload.status}' = 'true' then 1 else 0 end
WHERE id = '${payload.id}';

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ad.id,
  dl.id device_location_id,
  d.mac_address,
  s.serial sensor,
  l.name location,
  case
  when ad.type = 0 then '='
  when ad.type = 1 then '<'
  when ad.type = 2 then '>'
  when ad.type = 3 then '<='
  when ad.type = 4 then '>='
  else 'Undefined'
end as name_type,
case
  when ad.severity = 4 then 'Normal'
  when ad.severity = 3 then 'Minor'
  when ad.severity = 2 then 'Major'
  when ad.severity = 1 then 'Warning'
  when ad.severity = 0 then 'Critical'
  else 'Undefined'
end as name_severity,
  case
  when ad.alarm_role = 0 then 'CLEAR_ALARM'
  when ad.alarm_role = 1 then 'CREATE_ALARM'
  end as alarm_role,
  ad.set_point,
  ad.every,
  ad.description,
  case when ad.status = 1 then 'Active' else 'Desactive' end status,
  ad.date_created
FROM
  `db-teg-test1`.alarm_sensors ad
  inner join `db-teg-test1`.device_locations dl on ad.device_location_id = dl.id
  inner join `db-teg-test1`.devices d on dl.device_id = d.id
  inner join `db-teg-test1`.locations l on dl.location_id = l.id
  inner join `db-teg-test1`.sensors s on dl.sensor_id = s.id
WHERE
  ad.client_id = $getClientID ORDER BY ad.id ASC;

SELECT number, case
  when number = 0 then '='
  when number = 1 then '<'
  when number = 2 then '>'
  when number = 3 then '<='
  when number = 4 then '>='
  else 'Undefined'
end as type,
case
  when number = 4 then 'Normal'
  when number = 3 then 'Minor'
  when number = 2 then 'Major'
  when number = 1 then 'Warning'
  when number = 0 then 'Critical'
  else 'Undefined'
end as severity
from `db-teg-test1`.count ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT number, case
when number = 0 then 'CLEAR_ALARM'
when number = 1 then 'CREATE_ALARM'
else 'UNDEFINED'
end role
from `db-teg-test1`.count ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 2

list.definition:
SELECT 'Dashboard' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 5 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'General Settings' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 1 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Device Locations' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 2 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Reports' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 2 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alarms' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 3 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost');

list.definition:
select
case
when '${getPannels}' = 'Dashboard' then 'dadcde76-fafe-4e62-81c2-569dc8a101c3'
when '${getPannels}' = 'General Settings' then 'dc32e257-3a80-44c6-b04e-8dcddbe61430'
when '${getPannels}' = 'Device Locations' then 'd3f55778-92a4-4b02-b885-ec56e04b6e41'
when '${getPannels}' = 'Alarms' then 'e837ab4d-0bb5-4cbc-83b3-6a1d8b59f7a2'
when '${getPannels}' = 'Reports' then 'f75e42aa-b555-4d29-b2f7-817968f7264a'
else 'dadcde76-fafe-4e62-81c2-569dc8a101c3'
end
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 3 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost');
list.name: getUID
list.query:
select
case
when '${getPannels}' = 'Dashboard' then 'dadcde76-fafe-4e62-81c2-569dc8a101c3'
when '${getPannels}' = 'General Settings' then 'dc32e257-3a80-44c6-b04e-8dcddbe61430'
when '${getPannels}' = 'Device Locations' then 'd3f55778-92a4-4b02-b885-ec56e04b6e41'
when '${getPannels}' = 'Alarms' then 'e837ab4d-0bb5-4cbc-83b3-6a1d8b59f7a2'
when '${getPannels}' = 'Reports' then 'f75e42aa-b555-4d29-b2f7-817968f7264a'
else 'dadcde76-fafe-4e62-81c2-569dc8a101c3'
end
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 3 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost');

list.definition:
select c.name from `db-teg-test1`.users u
inner join `db-teg-test1`.clients c on c.id = u.client_id
where 
case
when $getUserRole IS NULL then 0
when $getUserRole > 1 then u.email = '${__user.email}'
when $getUserRole <= 1 then 1
when '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost' then 1
else 0 
end;
list.name: getClient
list.query:
select c.name from `db-teg-test1`.users u
inner join `db-teg-test1`.clients c on c.id = u.client_id
where 
case
when $getUserRole IS NULL then 0
when $getUserRole > 1 then u.email = '${__user.email}'
when $getUserRole <= 1 then 1
when '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost' then 1
else 0 
end;
